tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  ticker_symbol STRING,
  company_name STRING,
  current_price DECIMAL,
  earnings_per_share DECIMAL,
  dividend_yield DECIMAL,
  price_to_earnings_ratio DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
 ratio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ratio_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 formula VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ratio_values (
 value_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ratio_id INT NOT NULL,
 period DATE NOT NULL,
 value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE investments (
 investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT NOT NULL,
 amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 date_invested DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialRatios (
 ratio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ratio_name VARCHAR(255),
 ratio_formula VARCHAR(255),
 ratio_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentMetrics (
 metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 metric_name VARCHAR(255),
 metric_description TEXT,
 metric_value DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalData (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 date DATE,
 closing_price DECIMAL(10,2),
 volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE CompanyProfiles (
 company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 company_name VARCHAR(255),
 sector VARCHAR(50),
 headquarters_city VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE UserActivity (
 activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 activity_type VARCHAR(50),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
